name: wlimeq1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpan2(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)), wceq(c2, c2))
stmt.pretty: mpan2(c0 = c1, WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2), c2 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c2)→ WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c2)→ WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2))
⊣ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c2)→ WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))
body.pretty: ⊢ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c2)→ WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c2)))

comment: Equality theorem for the limit class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jun-2018.)
